name: Graoumf Tracker 2 Module
summary: A GT2 file is an audio module format used by the Graoumf Tracker 2 audio tracking program for Windows. It contains multiple audio samples, instruments, patterns, effects, and notes that comprise the melody. GT2 files also store metadata about the module, such as the title of the module and the name and version of the tracker that created the module.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
